ygData.subject: Re: re: Cloak the joke
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm - I m pretty sure you make a patchwork cloak as supposed to a tattered cloak.  I have never seen a tattered cloak - Manik only gives me patchwork cloaks as
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm - I'm pretty sure you make a patchwork cloak as supposed to a tattered
cloak. I have never seen a tattered cloak - Manik only gives me patchwork
cloaks as part of the "reward."

QdP

--- jbuckingham@... wrote:
>
>
>
> > Ok has anyone actually seen a tattered cloak
>
> Ruined wolf pelt + cloak pattern in a tailoring kit = small tattered
> cloak
>
> All the rumors of getting it from the Manik quest were becasue the cloak
> pattern
> is only a recent addition, and previously it was impossible to make a
> tattered
> cloak, only get one as a reward for a quest..
>
>
